languages.text: "Ваша Светлость, прежде чем мы приступим к обсуждению интересующих вас тем, я не могу не задать вопрос. Еще совсем недавно династию фон Валанциус возглавляла Леди Теодора. Я не получал вестей о ее смерти. Как вышло, что теперь вы — {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольный Торговец{/g}?"

traits.locale_text: "Ваша Светлость, прежде чем мы приступим к обсуждению интересующих вас тем, я не могу не задать вопрос. Еще совсем недавно династию фон Валанциус возглавляла леди Теодора. Я не получал вестей о ее смерти. Как вышло, что теперь вы — {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольный Торговец{/g}?"

languages.text: "Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, before we proceed with discussing the matters that are of interest to you, there is a question I feel compelled to ask. It was only recently that Lady Theodora was the head of House von Valancius. I have received no word of her demise. How is it that you are now the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}?"
languages.original_text: "Ваша Светлость, прежде чем мы приступим к обсуждению интересующих вас тем, я не могу не задать вопрос. Еще совсем недавно династию фон Валанциус возглавляла Леди Теодора. Я не получал вестей о ее смерти. Как вышло, что теперь вы — {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольный Торговец{/g}?"

It was only recently that Lady Theodora was head of House von Valancius. I have received no word of her death. How is it that you are now the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}?"

It was only recently that Lady Theodora was the head of House von Valancius. I have received no word of her demise. How is it that you are now the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}?"

"Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, before we proceed with discussing the matters that are of interest to you, there is a question I feel compelled to ask. It was only recently that Lady Theodora was the head of House von Valancius. I have received no word of her demise. How is it that you are now the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}?"

languages.text: "Eure {mf|Lord|Lady}schaft, bevor wir die Angelegenheiten besprechen, die für Euch von Interesse sind, sehe ich mich genötigt, Euch eine Frage zu stellen. Noch vor kurzem war Lady Theodora der Kopf des Hauses Valancius. Ich habe keine Nachricht ihres Ablebens erhalten. Wieso seid Ihr nun {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}{mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin}{/g}?"
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, before we proceed with discussing the matters that are of interest to you, there is a question I feel compelled to ask. It was only recently that Lady Theodora was the head of House von Valancius. I have received no word of her demise. How is it that you are now the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}?"

traits.locale_text: "Eure {mf|Lord|Lady}schaft, bevor wir die Angelegenheiten besprechen, die für Euch von Interesse sind, sehe ich mich genötigt, Euch eine Frage zu stellen. Noch vor kurzem war Lady Theodora der Kopf des Hauses Valancius. Ich habe keine Nachricht ihres Ablebens erhalten. Wieso seid Ihr nun {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}{mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin}{/g}?"

languages.text: « Votre Seigneurie, avant que nous ne discutions des affaires qui vous intéressent, je dois vous poser une question. Encore récemment, la maison von Valancius était dirigée par dame Théodora. Je n'ai pas été informé de sa mort. Comment se fait-il que vous soyez maintenant {mf|le|la} {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}{mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}{/g} ? »
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, before we proceed with discussing the matters that are of interest to you, there is a question I feel compelled to ask. It was only recently that Lady Theodora was the head of House von Valancius. I have received no word of her demise. How is it that you are now the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}?"

traits.locale_text: « Votre Seigneurie, avant que nous ne discutions des affaires qui vous intéressent, je dois vous poser une question. Encore récemment, la maison von Valancius était dirigée par dame Théodora. Je n'ai pas été informé de sa mort. Comment se fait-il que vous soyez maintenant {mf|le|la} {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}{mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}{/g} ? »

languages.text: “大人，在继续讨论您感兴趣的问题之前，我有个问题不得不问。不久之前，冯·瓦兰修斯家族的首领还是西奥多拉夫人，我并没有得到她去世的消息。怎么现在您成了{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}行商浪人{/g}了？”
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, before we proceed with discussing the matters that are of interest to you, there is a question I feel compelled to ask. It was only recently that Lady Theodora was the head of House von Valancius. I have received no word of her demise. How is it that you are now the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}?"

traits.locale_text: “大人，在继续讨论您感兴趣的问题之前，我有个问题不得不问。不久之前，冯·瓦兰修斯家族的首领还是西奥多拉夫人，我并没有得到她去世的消息。怎么现在您成了{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}行商浪人{/g}了？”

languages.text: 「陛下、あなたが話したい件を進める前に、どうしても伺いたいことがある。シオドーラ様がフォン・ヴァランシウス家の当主だったのは、つい最近のこと。彼女が亡くなったとは聞いてない。なぜ今はあなたが{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}自由開拓者{/g}を名乗っているのだ？」
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, before we proceed with discussing the matters that are of interest to you, there is a question I feel compelled to ask. It was only recently that Lady Theodora was the head of House von Valancius. I have received no word of her demise. How is it that you are now the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}?"

traits.locale_text: 「陛下、あなたが話したい件を進める前に、どうしても伺いたいことがある。シオドーラ様がフォン・ヴァランシウス家の当主だったのは、つい最近のこと。彼女が亡くなったとは聞いてない。なぜ今はあなたが{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}自由開拓者{/g}を名乗っているのだ？」

languages.text: «Mi{mf|lord|lady}, antes de que procedamos a discutir los asuntos que son de su interés, hay una pregunta que me siento obligado a hacer. No hace mucho que Lady Theodora era la líder de la Casa von Valancius. No he recibido noticias de su fallecimiento. ¿Cómo es que ahora ocupa usted el cargo de {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Comerciante Independiente{/g}?».
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, before we proceed with discussing the matters that are of interest to you, there is a question I feel compelled to ask. It was only recently that Lady Theodora was the head of House von Valancius. I have received no word of her demise. How is it that you are now the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}?"

traits.locale_text: «Mi{mf|lord|lady}, antes de que procedamos a discutir los asuntos que son de su interés, hay una pregunta que me siento obligado a hacer. No hace mucho que Lady Theodora era la líder de la Casa von Valancius. No he recibido noticias de su fallecimiento. ¿Cómo es que ahora ocupa usted el cargo de {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Comerciante Independiente{/g}?».

languages.text: "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, sizi ilgilendiren meseleleri konuşmaya geçmeden önce, sormam gerektiğini hissettiğim bir soru var. Bir süre öncesine kadar von Valancius Hanesi'nin başında Leydi Theodora vardı. Vefatına dair bir haber işitmedim. Acaba nasıl oldu da yeni {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Hür Tacir{/g} siz oldunuz?"
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, before we proceed with discussing the matters that are of interest to you, there is a question I feel compelled to ask. It was only recently that Lady Theodora was the head of House von Valancius. I have received no word of her demise. How is it that you are now the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}?"
